pages.text: The mushroom fields and its coast variant are rare biomes that often spawn as a separated island, therefore they are also known as Mushroom Island. Covered by $(l:blocks/dirt)mycelium$() and both small and big $(l:blocks/mushroom)mushrooms$(), the biome is known for the fact that neither monsters nor animals spawn on the surface. The entire biome is inhabitated by $(l:mobs/cow)mooshrooms$().
